includedAssets.title: Pilot
includedAssets.synopsis: In the year 2046 Joshua Nolan attempts to keep the peace in Defiance, a town where humans and extraterrestrial species coexist.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the year 2046 Joshua Nolan attempts to keep the peace in Defiance, a town where humans and extraterrestrial species coexist.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the year 2046 Joshua Nolan attempts to keep the peace in Defiance, a town where humans and extraterrestrial species coexist.

includedAssets.title: Down In The Ground Where The Dead Men Go
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep2 - Down In The Ground Where The Dead Men Go
includedAssets.synopsis: Defiance comes under threat once more, while Nolan and the mayor clash over the townspeople's traditions.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Defiance comes under threat once more, while Nolan and the mayor clash over the townspeople's traditions.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Defiance comes under threat once more, while Nolan and the mayor clash over the townspeople's traditions.

includedAssets.title: The Devil In The Dark
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - The Devil In The Dark
includedAssets.synopsis: Nolan investigates the murder of two residents, ripped apart by mutant Hellbugs. Meanwhile, Irisa is haunted by her past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nolan investigates the murder of two residents, ripped apart by mutant Hellbugs. Meanwhile, Irisa is haunted by her past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nolan investigates the murder of two residents, ripped apart by mutant Hellbugs. Meanwhile, Irisa is haunted by her past.

includedAssets.title: A Well Respected Man
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep4 - A Well Respected Man
includedAssets.synopsis: As Rafe tries to understand his son's death, a mass abduction hits the town, with Kenya among the those taken.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Rafe tries to understand his son's death, a mass abduction hits the town, with Kenya among the those taken.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Rafe tries to understand his son's death, a mass abduction hits the town, with Kenya among the those taken.

includedAssets.title: The Serpent's Egg
includedAssets.synopsis: Nolan and Amanda's road trip hits a speed bump, while Irisa bumps into a terrible figure from her past.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Nolan and Amanda's road trip hits a speed bump, while Irisa bumps into a terrible figure from her past.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Nolan and Amanda's road trip hits a speed bump, while Irisa bumps into a terrible figure from her past.

includedAssets.title: Brothers In Arms
includedAssets.synopsis: As more is revealed about the artefact, Nolan is visited by an old friend and Amanda tries to encourage a move against the Earth Republic.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As more is revealed about the artefact, Nolan is visited by an old friend and Amanda tries to encourage a move against the Earth Republic.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As more is revealed about the artefact, Nolan is visited by an old friend and Amanda tries to encourage a move against the Earth Republic.

includedAssets.title: Good Bye Blue Sky
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - Good Bye Blue Sky
includedAssets.synopsis: Suker makes an unexpected request, while Nolan tries to prepare the townspeople after Irisa has a vision of approaching danger.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Suker makes an unexpected request, while Nolan tries to prepare the townspeople after Irisa has a vision of approaching danger.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Suker makes an unexpected request, while Nolan tries to prepare the townspeople after Irisa has a vision of approaching danger.

includedAssets.title: I Just Wasn't Made For These Times
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep8 - I Just Wasn't Made For These Times
includedAssets.synopsis: Defiance's very existence is threatened as an astronaut from the year 2013, long thought dead, is found alive.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Defiance's very existence is threatened as an astronaut from the year 2013, long thought dead, is found alive.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Defiance's very existence is threatened as an astronaut from the year 2013, long thought dead, is found alive.

includedAssets.title: If I Ever Leave This World Alive
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep9 - If I Ever Leave This World Alive
includedAssets.synopsis: As a plague begins to strike down the residents of Defiance, Nolan desperately searches for the cure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As a plague begins to strike down the residents of Defiance, Nolan desperately searches for the cure.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As a plague begins to strike down the residents of Defiance, Nolan desperately searches for the cure.

includedAssets.title: The Bride Wore Black
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep10 - The Bride Wore Black
includedAssets.synopsis: Rafe's sudden realisation puts Alak and Christie's big day in danger. Meanwhile, Tommy launches a murder investigation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Rafe's sudden realisation puts Alak and Christie's big day in danger. Meanwhile, Tommy launches a murder investigation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Rafe's sudden realisation puts Alak and Christie's big day in danger. Meanwhile, Tommy launches a murder investigation.

includedAssets.title: Past Is Prologue
includedAssets.synopsis: As the mayoral race gets into the finishing straight and tensions rise, Nolan is called into action.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As the mayoral race gets into the finishing straight and tensions rise, Nolan is called into action.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the mayoral race gets into the finishing straight and tensions rise, Nolan is called into action.

includedAssets.title: Everything Is Broken
includedAssets.synopsis: As the election results are revealed, Nolan finds himself facing up to his past. Season finale.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As the election results are revealed, Nolan finds himself facing up to his past. Season finale.
